item.title: Joe Kennedy III blasts RFK Jr. after fiery Senate hearing, fueling Kennedy family infighting: 'He must resign'
item.description: Joe Kennedy III blasted cousin RFK Jr. after a fiery Senate hearing, escalating a bitter Kennedy family feud over Trump ties and his MAHA movement.
